title: Support tickets take so long to get responses -.-
body:
This is just a whiney rant but, 3 days is such a long time to go without response from the riot team, in fact I don't believe I've ever waited this long before, riot used to be reasonably fast all things considered. Now I do understand there's gonna be thousands of tickets sent a day, so I get it takes a while but, I literally cannot access my account, and I'm stressing about potentially it being gone, and the amount of time I have to wait to get any response at all is getting on my nerves. Anyways I hope this doesn't put rioters on tilt too much if they see it just a point I feel needs to be made.

P.S. this an NA account I made years ago and never used my actual account is on EUW

replies.body:
Typically, this kind of post would be deleted as there is nothing for us H&S agents to actually take action and help with....
HOWEVER!

I noticed that you've been constantly submitted more and more updates to your ticket. While you might think that would get the EU agents attention a little faster, it can actually bump your ticket to the end of the line due to how the system is built. Your best bet for getting a response sooner is to first: wait on their reply before commenting on the ticket any further.
If you still don't get a response just try to re-submit a ticket. Otherwise there can't be much you can do because you're unable to reach a Rioter and have them help you out.
